metadata.title: Bering Sea Climate Space and Time Series

creators.name: Atmospheric Research (OAR), Pacific Marine Environmental Laboratory (PMEL)

metadata.description:
Data cover the period from 1958 - present and were complied from the NCEP/NCAR analysis: windstress curl, wind stress, heat flux, wind mixing, low-level cloud cover.
An NPMR project
metadata.notes:
Purpose: Data collected to support the  NPMR project "Modes of Climate Change for the Bering Sea"

Status: In Progress

Maintenance frequency: None Planned

Access constraints: Requires Contributor's permission

Use constraints: Requires Contributor's permission
